description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.

interface hardware/software.

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: Bind the MAC of ONU.
While the MAC is not bound, the ONU can not go into
effect and configurations can not be set.
Set 0-0-0 (MAC address) to the EPON device port will
unbind the relationship with the original MAC and
configurations will be set to default values.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfOnuBindMacAddress

description: The ONU firmware update result.
updating - The ONU is updating firmware right now.
ok - The ONU update result is OK.
fail - The ONU update result is fail.
fileNotExist - The ONU update failed because the file does not exist.
notSetFilename - The ONU firmware filename is not set.
fileNotMatchONU - The ONU firmware does not match the ONU.
timeout - The ONU responses timeout.
otherError - The ONU update result is unknown.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfOnuUpdateResult

description: ONU registered type.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfOnuRegType

description: The filename of the ONU firmware to be updated.
Note that the filename must contain the file path.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfOnuUpdateFileName

description: A hpnicfEponOnuAutoBindTrap notification is sent
when a silent ONU is bound automatically.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfEponOnuAutoBindTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfOnuBindMacAddress s EXAMPL HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfEponOperationResult s EXAMPLE

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: Bind the MAC of ONU.
While the MAC is not bound, the ONU can not go into
effect and configurations can not be set.
Set 0-0-0 (MAC address) to the EPON device port will
unbind the relationship with the original MAC and
configurations will be set to default values.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfOnuBindMacAddress

description: The result of EPON operation.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfEponOperationResult

description: A hpnicfEponOnuPortStpStateTrap notification is sent when
a port turns into another state in STP environment.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfEponOnuPortStpStateTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfEponStpPortIndex i 0 HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfEponStpPortDescr s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfEponStpPortState i 1

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The index of the STP ports.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfEponStpPortIndex

description: The description of the STP ports.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfEponStpPortDescr

description: The current state of the port (i.e. disabled, discarding
learning and forwarding).
variables.name: HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfEponStpPortState

description: A hpnicfEponOnuLaserFailedTrap notification is sent when
an ONU has trouble with laser, such as laser constantly turned on
signal degradation or optics EOL (End of Life).
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfEponOnuLaserFailedTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfEponOnuLaserState i 1

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The state of ONU laser.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfEponOnuLaserState

description: A hpnicfOnuSmlkSwitchoverTrap notification is sent when
an ONU SMLK switchover is detected.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfOnuSmlkSwitchoverTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfOnuSmlkGroupID i 9999 HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfOnuSmlkFirstPonStatus i 1 HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfOnuSmlkSecondPonStatus i 1

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The SMLK group ID of ONU.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfOnuSmlkGroupID

description: The transmitting status of ONU first PON port in a SMLK group.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfOnuSmlkFirstPonStatus

description: The transmitting status of ONU second PON port in a SMLK group.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-EPON-MIB::hpnicfOnuSmlkSecondPonStatus
